title: Start for free
paragraph1: When you use our open source command line tool, it deploys the backend classes on a lambda infrastructure on AWS.
paragraph2: Automatically provision for increases in application traffic, as well as save money on decreases in usage.

title: Focus on your app logic
paragraph1: Helps you organize your API code in classes that are deployed and scaled individually.
paragraph2: Our tool generates the frontend interfaces that use JSON-RPC transparently behind the scenes to implement a typesafe API call mechanism that is less bug prone than conventional  methods.  We do support REST and Webhooks also!

title: Spend zero time configuring servers
paragraph1: When you use our cloud, deploy the API code on a pre-configured infrastructure with a simple shell command, without prior AWS knowledge.
paragraph2: Compared with ExpressJS, there is no need to deal with URLs, headers and query params - just use the SDK autogenerated by our open source tool
